sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SOLICITOR-GENERAL, . See Attorney-General. The position of the solicitor-general for Scotland in the main corresponds with that of the English solicitor-general. He is next in rank to the lord-advocate. In the United States the office of solicitor-general of the United States was created by Act of Congress in 1870.
